full_summary:
### Arctic Observing Mission (AOM) Pre-Formulation Study Mission Design

#### Tender Details

* Reference Number: PW-22-01017638
* Solicitation Number: 9F045-22-0235
* Date of Publication: 16 December 2022
* Tender Closing Date: 06 April 2023 14:00:00
* Status: Expired

#### Request for Proposal

The Canadian Space Agency, through the issuance of this Request for Proposal (RFP), invites interested suppliers to refine the mission design for the Arctic Observing Mission (AOM) and provide substantiated cost estimates. This work will build on the efforts of the Polar Communications and Weather (PCW) mission and aim to assess and estimate the costs associated with implementing the mission's objectives.

#### Key Requirements and Deliverables

The selected supplier will be responsible for delivering a refined mission design that takes into account the specific requirements and constraints of the AOM. To that end, the supplier will provide detailed plans and cost estimates for the mission's implementation, including any necessary hardware and software components.

#### Period of Performance

The contract is expected to have a duration of 18 months from the date of contract award.

#### Pre-Submission Conference

A virtual bidders' conference was held on 17 January 2023 at 15:00 (EST) via Microsoft TEAMS. Potential bidders were encouraged to attend or send a representative to review the scope of the requirement and ask questions.

#### Amendments

This RFP has undergone several amendments to clarify the requirements and specifications. These changes include:

* Amendment #3: Tender closing date change to 06 April 2023
* Amendment #2: Publication of Canada's responses to bidders' questions
* Amendment #1: Bid submission deadline change and additional information on expected deliverables and key performance indicators.

#### Tender Documents

The Contracting Authority has posted various documents related to this tender, including the Request for Proposal, Solicitation, Bidder's Conference Presentation, and Amendments. These documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website.

#### Definitions and Acronyms

The following definitions and acronyms are used throughout the RFP:

* AOM: Arctic Observing Mission
* PCW: Polar Communications and Weather mission
* RFP: Request for Proposal
* RFP #: Solicitation Number
* Alternate bid language can be included if translation does not translate or has injuries that for the upcoming Quarterly options/election language
